enabled.$description: References semantic inverse attention status background color, Enabled state.

disabled.$description: Disabled attention badge background color using status disabled tokens for semantic consistency.

enabled.$description: References semantic inverse info status background color, Enabled state.

disabled.$description: Disabled info badge background color using status disabled tokens for semantic consistency.

enabled.$description: References semantic inverse critical status background color, Enabled state.

disabled.$description: Disabled critical badge background color using status disabled tokens for semantic consistency.

enabled.$description: References semantic inverse resolved status background color, Enabled state.

disabled.$description: Disabled resolved badge background color using status disabled tokens for semantic consistency.

enabled.$description: Maximum contrast text color for info badge in enabled state. Uses inversity-flipped for white text on colored backgrounds.

disabled.$description: Maximum contrast disabled info badge text color using inversity-flipped for consistency with badge design pattern.

enabled.$description: Maximum contrast text color for attention badge in enabled state. Uses inversity-flipped for white text on colored backgrounds.

disabled.$description: Maximum contrast disabled attention badge text color using inversity-flipped for consistency with badge design pattern.

enabled.$description: Maximum contrast text color for critical badge in enabled state. Uses inversity-flipped for white text on colored backgrounds.

disabled.$description: Maximum contrast disabled critical badge text color using inversity-flipped for consistency with badge design pattern.

enabled.$description: Maximum contrast text color for resolved badge in enabled state. Uses inversity-flipped for white text on colored backgrounds.

disabled.$description: Maximum contrast disabled resolved badge text color using inversity-flipped for consistency with badge design pattern.

sm.$description: Horizontal padding of small size badge. Makes the badge round.

lg.$description: Horizontal padding of large size badge. Makes the badge round.

sm.$description: Vertical padding of small size badge. Makes the badge round.

lg.$description: Vertical padding of large size badge. Makes the badge round.
Max width of large size badge. Maybe this is obsolete if we restrict the amount of characters the other way.

sm.$description: Minimal width of small size badge. Makes the badge round.

lg.$description: Minimal width of large size badge. Makes the badge round.

sm.$description: Height of small size badge. Makes the badge round.

lg.$description: Height of small size badge. Makes the badge round.

badge-label.$description: Strong font weight for optimal scannability.
